title: Happy with DPF 4.  Question on WF Windows WorkFlow
ques:
Hi:

I am so glad I purchased the Design Pattern Framework 4.0. I cannot wait to implement it in my projects. 
I am curious to know where the Windows Workflow fits in and how to use it with the Design Pattern Framework.

Thank you
Fred

answers.ans:
Hi,

Please read Chain of Responsibility Pattern.This will exactly match Windows Work Flow which you are looking for.
Hope this helps.
